name: Gravity Maze
description:
Gravity Maze is 2D physic maze game that you can customize the maze, get balls to the end by changing gravity

  • You can create custom size mazes that can be generate randomly or you can make it yourself.

  • Challenge yourself by getting the balls to the end or just have physic fun.

  • You can edit the maze or make creative design with the maze editor.

  • You can share you creation on the workshop.
